Class MathFuncs

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samskivert.depot.MathFuncs

  • public class MathFuncs
extends Object
    Provides static methods for math-related function construction.

      • ceil

        public static FluentExp<Number> ceil(SQLExpression<? extends Number> exp)
        Creates an expression that computes the integer ceiling of the supplied expression. Note that this method forces the result to type Number because databases may perform widening or conversion under the hood, and using Number allows the application to do the appropriate conversion at runtime.

      • trunc

        public static FluentExp<Number> trunc(SQLExpression<? extends Number> exp)
        Creates an expression that computes the truncation of the supplied expression, i.e. the next closest whole number to zero. Note that this method forces the result to type Number because databases may perform widening or conversion under the hood, and using Number allows the application to do the appropriate conversion at runtime.
